Back to Alexander Scriabin

Alexander Scriabin

Prélude et nocturne, op. 9

1894

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 7'

  • 1. Prélude in C-sharp minor
  • 2. Nocturne in D-flat major

Both pieces are for the left hand alone.

Recommended editions

  • Collected Works (Muzyka/Jurgenson) · II/7 · Pieces / Etudes · ed. Valentina Rubtsova / Pavel Shatsky
  • Henle · HN 1013 · ed. Valentina Rubtsova
  • Könemann · K 213 · Preludes I · ed. Victor Ekimovsky [no. 1]
  • Könemann · K 262 · Individual Pieces · ed. Victor Ekimovsky [no. 2]
  • Peters · EP 11065 · ed. Günter Philipp

1. Prélude in C-sharp minor

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3

2. Nocturne in D-flat major

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 4
